metadata.name: Potential Credential Dumping Attempt Via PowerShell Remote Thread
metadata.comment: Detects remote thread creation by PowerShell processes into "lsass.exe"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND endswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('\\lsass.exe')))

output.summary: Detects remote thread creation by PowerShell processes into "lsass.exe"
